description: The sailor called for help when his yacht got caught on rocks in Alderney during low tide.
title: Grounded Alderney yachtsman given lift to France
title_page: Grounded Alderney yachtsman given lift to France - BBC News
maintext: "The multi-agency operational group have worked continuously and tirelessly since the start of the pandemic and will continue to do so to protect our island and its residents," it said .
